title: AnalyticalInstrument
description: The analytical instrument is the category of instrument used to perform an analytical measurement or observation.

type.title: type
type.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">type:InstrumentTypeTerm</font> reports a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the category of instrument used in an analytical session (e.g., XRF, ICPMS, SHRIMP, etc.).

model.title: model
model.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">mode:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a string identifying the model of instrument used. (e.g., instrument type = XRD, model = Siemens Diffraktometer D500).

serialNumber.title: serialNumber
serialNumber.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">serialNumber:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a string that contains the serial number of the machine used in an analytical session.

commissionDate.title: commissionDate
commissionDate.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">commissionDate</font> is an association between an <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalInstrument</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">TM_Instant</font> corresponding to the date of the commissioning of an instrument.

location.title: location
location.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">location</font> is an association between an <font color="#4f81bd">AnalyticalInstrument</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:Responsibility</font> describing the owner and the location of an instrument.

usedIn-1.title: usedIn
usedIn-1.description: The property usedIn is an association between an AnalyticalInstrument and an AnalyticalSession identifying an analytical sessions which used this instrument.

usedIn-2.title: usedIn
usedIn-2.description: The property usedIn is an association between an AnalyticalInstrument and an AnalyticalSession identifying an analytical sessions which used this instrument.

usedIn-3.title: usedIn
usedIn-3.description: The property usedIn is an association between an AnalyticalInstrument and an AnalyticalSession identifying an analytical sessions which used this instrument.
